WorkItem.Description:
To Reproduce:
1. Start VS 2010 debugging (F5).
2. Navigate to /Dinners/Create (login required)
3. Click Save (without entering any data into the text boxes)

Visual Studio breaks at NerdDinner.Designer.cs line 216 with 
ConstraintException was unhandled by user code.
"This property cannot be set to a null value."

Note this exception is not generated when the project is Started without Debugging (Ctrl+F5)

Is this an issue with the Visual Studio Debugger?

Comments.Message: I'm unable to duplicate this issue. I wonder if it's been fixed in the meantime?
Can't duplicate this... Calling it fixed!
